    "Model"                        "models/creeps/neutral_creeps/n_creep_gnoll/n_creep_gnoll_frost.vmdl"

    "BoundsHullName"               "DOTA_HULL_SIZE_HERO"
    "RingRadius"                   "100"
    "StatusHealth"                 "1950"
    "AttackCapabilities"           "DOTA_UNIT_CAP_NO_ATTACK"

    "AttackDamageMax"              "50"
    "AttackRange"                  "0"
    "MovementSpeed"                "300"
    "MovementTurnRate"             "1.0"

    "BountyGoldMin"                "5"

    "Ability1"                     "dude_passive"

    // Custom

"gem_special_range_check"
{
    "BaseClass"                "npc_dota_tower"
    "Model"                    "models/buildings/building_racks_melee_reference.vmdl"
    "ModelScale"               "0.5"
    "BoundsHullName"           "DOTA_HULL_SIZE_HERO"
    "RingRadius"               "100"
    "StatusHealth"               "50"
    "AttackCapabilities"       "DOTA_UNIT_CAP_RANGED_ATTACK"
    "AttackDamageMin"          "0"
    "AttackDamageMax"          "1"
    "AttackRate"               "0.0"
    "AttackAnimationPoint"     "0.0"
    "AttackAcquisitionRange"   "666"
    "AttackRange"              "666"
    "MovementTurnRate"         "1.0"
    "ProjectileModel"          "particles/base_attacks/generic_projectile.vpcf"
    "ProjectileSpeed"          "711"

    "Ability1"                 "tower_invulnerability"
    "Ability2"                 "tower_attack_scripts"

    // Custom
    "UnitName"                 "Range CHeck"
    "AttackTargets"            "GEM_ATTACK_AIR"
}
